html: before they call, I will answer. Because of Israel's rebellion and wickedness, their past prayers to Jehovah went unheeded. In their righteous and glorious future, he will intervene even before they have called on him in prayer (33:21-22). The Millennium will be a time of great revelation: "In that day whatsoever any man shall ask, it shall be given unto him…. In that day when the Lord shall come, he shall reveal all things—Things which have passed, and hidden things which no man knew" (D&C 101:27, 32-33). This statement directly contrasts with the statement in 66:4, in which the Lord called to Israel but no one would answer him.
